duties_responsibilities.duty: Supervise and coordinate the activities of the maintenance team to ensure efficient and effective operations.
Develop and implement maintenance procedures and schedules to minimize downtime and maximize productivity.
Inspect equipment, systems, and facilities regularly to identify and resolve issues in a timely manner.
Manage and prioritize work orders, ensuring that tasks are completed within established timelines.
Train and mentor maintenance staff, providing guidance and support to enhance their skills and knowledge.
Collaborate with other departments to coordinate maintenance activities and ensure smooth workflow.
Monitor inventory levels of maintenance supplies and equipment, and initiate purchase orders as needed.
Maintain accurate records of maintenance activities, including work performed, materials used, and costs incurred.
Ensure compliance with safety regulations and company policies, promoting a safe working environment.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or equivalent; additional certification or training in maintenance is a plus
